canon.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a Christian priest who has special duties in a cathedral
canon.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a standard, rule, or principle, or set of these, that are believed by a group of people to be right and good
canon.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Mapplethorpeâ€™s pictures offended the canons of American good taste.
canon.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a list of books or pieces of music that are officially recognized as being the work of a certain writer
canon.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: all the books that are recognized as being the most important pieces of literature
canon.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: a piece of music in which a tune is started by one singer or instrument and is copied by each of the others
canon.translation[0].definitions[5].defi: an established law of the Christian Church
canon.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a brand (=type) of camera and other electronic equipment such as photocopiers made by the Japanese company Canon
